EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.SF SI Replat Track
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - San Francisco - Nov. 9th, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in San Francisco, CA!
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days System Integrator Workshop: Replatforming Track When: Thursday, November 9, 2017 Where: Pivotal San Francisco, 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
Remember to bring your laptops!
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in San Francisco!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
